node.title: NZ sevens teams frustrated as border restrictions hurt Comm Games prep
node.description: New Zealand's teams are unable to compete in upcoming Sevens World Series legs.
node.content: ["New Zealand's men's and women's sevens teams are waiting to hear when they'll be able to return to the international circuit.", "Despite naming their squads on Friday, both sides have been forced to pull out of this month's World Series rounds in Spain due to New Zealand's COVID-19 border restrictions.\u00a0", "It's a hard pill to swallow for the Kiwis, who've been left to watch on as their opponents rack up crucial game time ahead of July's Commonwealth Games.", "The All Blacks Sevens and Black Ferns Sevens haven't played since the Tokyo Olympics, and it may be another six months until they get to do it again.", "\"It's certainly frustrating and disappointing not to be there,\" All Blacks Sevens coach Clark Laidlaw tells Newshub. \"We would love to be back out there.\"", "Frustrating, because while their Sevens World Series opponents return to competition amidst COVID, the two New Zealand sides are unable to compete due to the decision to delay the reopening of our borders.", "\"Yeah it is tough sitting at home and watching all the other teams play,\" Sam Dickson says. \"They're in Dubai and now they're going to Spain, which a lot of us boys haven't been to, and we were planning on going.\"", "That lack of match practice is equally as frustrating for the coach.", "\"Teams have now had six tournaments since the Olympics, and we've had none.\"", "It's hoped they may be able to rejoin the circuit for the fifth round of the men's series in Vancouver late next month - but it's no given.", "\"How confident am I that things will go ahead? Absolutely no idea,\" Laidlaw adds.", "That's left them searching for competition closer to home, and they will take opportunities wherever they can find them.", "\"We'll get into the community game, and I think there's maybe seven games if you get to the final. So that'll be a shock to the system for some of the boys who are used to playing two in a day or three in a day.\"", "Dickson meanwhile is hoping for a hitout against none other than Olympic champions, Fiji.", "\"Yeah I don't know the details of that exactly, but I think it's a Fijian tournament down there,\" he adds. \"Fijians always love playing against Kiwis.\"", "But for now the Kiwis will remain flightless, while the Flying Fijians and co jet their way around the world.\u00a0"]
